name: Death Cheat
desc: You will not lose your Hunter if you fail to extract, but equipment and missing Health Chunks will be lost.

name: Rampage
desc: Killing an enemy Hunter while at least one Health Chunk is empty triggers a Restoration for your Hunter.

name: Relentless
desc: Your Hunter won't lose a Health Chunk when downed.

name: Remedy
desc: Using Dark Sight, interact with a Trait Spur within range to trigger a Restoration effect similar to banishing for your team's Hunters. (25m)

name: Shadow
desc: Monsters can't see you, but they can still hear you. Burns when your Hunter is downed.
